actions.name: Sting
actions.desc: _Melee Weapon Attack:_ +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. _Hit:_ 6 (1d8+2) piercing damage, and the target must succeed on a DC 12 CON save or take 10 (3d6) poison damage. If the poison damage reduces the target to 0 HP, the target is stable but poisoned for 1 hour, even after regaining HP, and is paralyzed while poisoned in this way.
